name: Pigeon Fighter
description:
What if there was two Romeos instead of just one? Pigeon Fighter takes place in an alternative universe where, two Romeos meet and fight for their Juliette! By sending pigeons with love letters and shooting down your enemy pigeons.

How to play:

Send Pigeons with love letters to Juliette's balcony, black pigeons are just spam, don't send them to Juliette. Meanwhile try to shoot as many enemy's pigeons as possible. The Game ends when Juliettte reaches one of the Romeos.

Controlls:
You may use Gamepads or Keyboard. Gamepads recomended.

Player 1:

Arrow keys to aim, '?' to shoot and '>' to change weapon.

Player 2:

WSAD to aim, Tab to shoot and '1' to change weapon.

The game was created during 48h Game Jam, in Warsaw, the theme was "Love" <3

By:

Al'ona BaranovaKrzysztof TaperekWojtek PłatekSzymon Piórkowski
